entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is introduced as someone who has been affected by Harry's Apparition, and his face is described as paler and damper than ever.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one performing the Apparition, and Dumbledore stumbles against him.

entities.name: horcrux
entities.description: The Horcrux is mentioned as something that Harry and his companions have successfully obtained.

relationships.description: Harry's Apparition causes Dumbledore to stumble against him.
The text states that Harry and his companions 'got the Horcrux', indicating that they have successfully obtained it.
